subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Women and Girls
Football (College)
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: In parting ways with its athletic director and naming an interim replacement, Texas neglected a qualified woman in its athletic department and highlighted a lack of female representation in Division I sports.
snippet: In parting ways with its athletic director and naming an interim replacement, Texas neglected a qualified woman in its athletic department and highlighted a lack of female representation in Division I sports.
